a.name: Assassin
a.rules: At night, the Assassin can choose a player to kill. If inspected by the Detective, the Assassin will not appear suspicious.

b.name: Murderer
b.rules: At night, the Murderer can choose a player to kill.

c.name: Schemer
c.rules: At night, the Schemer can choose a player to frame. If the selected player is inspected by the detective in the same night, they will appear suspicious.

d.name: Spy
d.rules: At night, the Spy can choose a player and find out what their role is.

dc.desc: Random Mafia with a Mischief Role.
dc.name: Mischievous

e.name: Memory Wiper
e.rules: At night, the Memory Wiper can choose a player and make them forget anything that happened that night.

f.name: Silencer
f.rules: At night, the Silence can choose a player and stop them from talking for the next day.

j.name: Thug
j.rules: This role does not perform any actions.

A.name: Detective
A.rules: At night, the Detective can choose a player and discover if they are suspicious or not.

B.name: Investigator
B.rules: At night, the Investigator can choose a player and search for clues.

D.name: Doctor
D.rules: At night, the Doctor may choose someone to take care of. If they are attacked by the mafia that night, they will not die.

E.desc: Distracts a player for the Night.
E.name: Escort
E.rules: At night, the Escort can choose a player and stop them from performing their action.

G.name: Warden
G.rules: At night, the Warden can choose a player and watch their house. If anyone visits the selected player, the warden will be alerted.

H.name: Forensic
H.rules: At night, the Forensic can choose a dead player to uncover their role.

I.name: Overseer
I.rules: At night, the Overseer can choose a player to see if they visit anyone that night. If the target goes to another players house, the Overseer will be notified.

W.desc: A mischief maker trying to get hung.
W.name: Gremlin
W.rules: The Gremlin can only win if they are hung. All players that voted against the Gremlin are punished, but the game will continue.
